ing: 1 pinch ground black pepper to taste
des: "Creamy, cool, delicious. This sauce complements any meal needing some extra oomph! Straight from my Greek mother's kitchen, it doesn't get much more authentic than this. Taste and adjust seasonings to desired taste."
ins:
Squeeze excess water from cucumber using a paper towel.
Blend cucumber, tofu, dill, garlic, pink salt, and black pepper in a food processor until evenly mixed.
